Corporate Events
at Everglades Holiday Park
With gorgeous scenery, exciting adventures, and a tranquility that can only be found in the Everglades, Everglades Holiday Park is the ideal location for your events or family celebrations in the Everglades. The Everglades ecosystem is one of America’s true treasures and is an amazing backdrop to host corporate and family events alike.
A vast and unspoiled resource, the wetlands are home to more than 2,000 types of plants and hundreds of species of animals. Everglades Holiday Park will strive to ensure that your event is everything that you’re hoping for. Before you arrive, we’ll review your party’s needs, and we can tailor our accommodations to suit your specific requirements and wishes.
A Non-Stop Adventure
Your journey begins as soon as you arrive at the park near Fort Lauderdale and climb aboard a state-of-the-art airboat for an *hour-long narrated
group airboat tour
.
Trek deep into the mystical wetlands
with Everglades airboat tours, where you’ll encounter incredible wildlife, some even swimming alongside your boat. When the tour ends, your party will be treated to a live alligator presentation performed by the renowned and highly entertaining Gator Boys Alligator Rescue team.
Hours of
Operation
Airboat tours are *60-minutes in length
Departing the airboat dock every 20 minutes
We open at 9:00 AM and our last tour of the day leaves the dock promptly at 5:00 PM. Please arrive no later than 3:30 PM to receive the full tour experience (hours are subject to change due to daylight savings time).
AN AUTHENTIC FLORIDA EXPERIENCE
There’s nowhere else in the world quite like the Everglades – if you have guests coming in from out of town for your business meeting or events, why confine yourself to a drab convention center or hotel?
Show them an authentic piece of South Florida and Fort Lauderdale by holding your corporate event at Everglades Holiday Park. We promise a memorable experience for everyone involved.
Whether you’re visiting from out of town or have lived here all your life, there’s always something new to discover in the vast, untamed wilderness of the Everglades. So, make your next team building activity a memorable one.
Why Choose Us for Your Next Corporate Event in Fort Lauderdale?
Imagine showing up for a day at the office, but instead of sitting at a desk, you’re gliding across the surface of the water through a pristine, untouched landscape surrounded by the gentle calls of nature. The wind rushes against your face as you make your way through the winding marshy pathways, and the warmth of the sunshine glows on your skin as you experience a scene like nowhere else in the world: the Florida Everglades.
To your left and right are those that you work with, sharing the joy of discovering a new environment inaccessible by foot alone. Throughout the experience, laughter, awe, and wonder fill the air and leave you with memories to last a lifetime, connecting you indefinitely to those whom it was shared with.
Research shows that sharing this type of connection in nature improves productivity in the workplace. Not only this, but it is a great way to meet new people that you would not regularly encounter in the office. Choosing Everglades Holiday Park for corporate events Fort Lauderdale allows for this experience and more with customized airboat tours and non-stop adventure, guaranteed for a good time.

EVERGLADES CORPORATE EVENTS
In efforts to promote improved communication and performance, reputable businesses are choosing to hold events outdoors. Fresh air and sunshine promotes a low stress, energetic atmosphere where top executives and employees talk openly, relaxed and at ease. The beautiful, natural setting of the Everglades near Fort Lauderdale gives employees the opportunity to escape the office to more clearly think through goals and objectives.
The perfect arena to exchange ideas, learn from colleagues and revisit core strategies in a non-threatening, comfortable environment, an Everglades Holiday Park corporate retreat is akin to workplace therapy! We can accommodate groups of any size for an unforgettable, team building experience.
Remember, Everglades Holiday Park offers excellent fishing opportunities as well, customized to your liking. An extraordinary experience, no one in your group will soon forget this one-of-a-kind corporate adventure.
Energize Your Team in a Venue Like No Other
There are numerous benefits of holding an event in a natural setting that, in turn, increase productivity in the workplace. Let’s explore some of the specific benefits of holding your next corporate meeting in a natural setting that contribute to this increase in productivity.
Enhanced Employee Engagement
Holding an event in a natural setting helps to boost employee engagement. When employees are able to connect over a fun, shared activity with a common goal that involves team building, they will, in turn, be more engaged with each other. This type of engagement carries far beyond the actual experience and leaves employees with lasting memories that continue to drive connection and, thus, productivity when back in the corporate space.
Building stronger teams
When employees are able to relish in a shared experience together, whether that be an airboat tour over the stunning Everglades or team-building activities on our expansive land, it builds stronger teams in the workplace. The skills learned over team building activities in the field are shown to carry over to the workplace, thus creating stronger teams and, therefore, higher levels of productivity.
Developing Skills
Holding a team building event in a natural setting helps increase workplace productivity further by helping employees develop skills. When employees are given the same tasks in the same environment, it can be challenging to reach out of their comfort zone and develop new skills. Whether or not the skills learned in the Everglades are related to work or not, learning new things helps employees feel empowered and valued by their workplace. Even if the skill is just developing further social skills, it becomes much easier to do so in a peaceful, natural setting rather than a high-stakes corporate setting.
Promoting Wellness
A healthy workforce is a productive workforce, and research has shown again and again that spending time in nature promotes wellness. Just the act of being in the fresh air and enjoying the sounds of nature has proven health benefits. Being in nature promotes physical and mental well-being, and healthy, happy employees are much more likely to be engaged, focused, and productive.
Facilitating Knowledge Sharing
Additionally, hosting a corporate event in nature facilitates knowledge sharing. Being in an open environment different than that of the day-to-day, or a closed-off indoor environment, allows people that do not normally interact to do so. People from different departments are able to have shared experiences and thus share knowledge, thus increasing productivity in the workplace.
Overall, through investing in events that bring joy to their employees, such as hosting events in nature, organizations can demonstrate their commitment to employee growth and connection, ultimately leading to a more productive workplace. It shows employees that the corporation cares about their wellbeing and leads to employees to become more invested in the workplace, and gives them a shared activity to connect over. Therefore, it becomes essential for companies to prioritize these types of events as key components of their culture.
Preferred Venues for Large Groups
The pavilion is one of the most preferred venues for larger groups. This is due to the number of people that it is able to host in all kinds of weather conditions, as well as the joy of sharing a meal in the open air. We regularly host large picnics, catered events, team-building activities, or use it as a meeting space. Sound carries exceptionally well in the pavilion, making it a great space to meet before and after the Everglades airboat tour, touch base, or even touch base on work related things before heading into the office the following day.
Looking for the perfect venue for that corporate slide presentation or family reunion near Fort Lauderdale in Broward County? Everglades Holiday Park’s pavilion is the ideal setting for large groups. With a capacity for up to 75 people, our pavilion is available to rent (contact us for pricing). Plan an unforgettable party under the pavilion and enjoy nature at its finest, compliments of Everglades Holiday Park. Birthday packages are available for ten or more guests.
BIRTHDAY PARTIES AND FAMILY ACTIVITIES
With so much to offer for both adults and kids, there’s no better place to hold a birthday party, Everglades business events, or family activity than Everglades Holiday Park near Fort Lauderdale. Our all-inclusive family event packages are affordable and contain everything you need to entertain a group of up to 75 people, ensuring a great time for all.
In addition to enjoying a thrilling airboat ride and getting up close and personal with gators, snakes and other creatures, kids will also learn valuable lessons about the role the Everglades play in our natural environment. You’ll learn why it’s important to conserve this valuable natural resource.
Restaurants and Catering Options for Events
There are various restaurant and catering options available at or near the park.
If you’re planning on visiting throughout the lunch hour with your team, our full-service cafe/deli is bursting with delicious options. The menu features our beloved Gator Kids’ Meal (contact us for pricing). It consists of a turkey sandwich or hot dog, a bag of potato chips, a cold drink, and a sample of our World Famous Alligator Bites.
Or, suppose you would like to eat offsite at a restaurant. In that case, there are a number of restaurants close by available to do so, such as next-door Cafe 27 Bar & Grill, complete with a tiki bar, or the all-around easy favorite, Subway.
If you are looking for catering options that would provide a more upscale meal, Aroma Market & Catering is a great option for that. Otherwise, any caterers that operate near Fort Lauderdale would suffice.
Whatever option you choose, whether it be eating onsite, dining at a nearby restaurant, or having your event catered, it will be delicious to enjoy with your whole team in the beautiful open-air setting that is the Everglades Holiday Park.
Outdoor Recreation
At Everglades Holiday Park, you can select from a range of rousing activities. You may hike, sightsee, fish – indeed, our fishing conditions are superb – or play games on acres of open land. To further customize visits, we accommodate parties of all sizes. We’ll likewise discuss any special requirements or requests that you have and we’ll meet those needs as best we can.
Everglades Holiday Park is located a short drive from downtown Ft. Lauderdale, making it easily accessible from Miami and throughout the South Florida Metro area. For your next family activity, choose the Everglades.

Our experienced and knowledgeable airboat captains will guide you through the waterways, sharing insights about the natural beauty, wildlife, and history of this incredible environment. You’ll have the chance to witness the stunning landscapes, spot various bird species, and learn about the importance of this delicate ecosystem. Informative Alligator Presentation Following the airboat tour, get up close and personal with the iconic residents of the Everglades – alligators! Our skilled handlers will provide a safe and informative presentation about these fascinating reptiles. Learn about their behaviors, habits, and role in the ecosystem. This presentation offers a unique opportunity to dispel myths and misconceptions while gaining a deeper understanding of these ancient creatures. Optional Lunch After the tour and presentation, you have the option to enjoy a delicious lunch. Take a break, relax, and reflect on the remarkable experiences of the day. It’s a great opportunity to connect with fellow visitors and share your thoughts about the Everglades adventure. Throughout the program, our priority is safety and education. Our guides and staff are well-trained to ensure a memorable and secure experience for everyone. We encourage questions, engagement, and interactive learning for participants of all ages. Whether you’re a nature enthusiast, a family with curious kids, or simply looking to explore one of Florida’s most unique ecosystems, our educational Everglades boat tour has something for everyone. Our Custom AirBoats Here are some key features of our custom-built state-of-the-art airboats: Cutting-Edge Engineering Our airboats are the result of advanced engineering, combining the latest technology and design principles. The hulls are crafted to navigate the diverse waterways of the Everglades, from open expanses to narrower channels, providing a smooth and stable ride. Propulsion The airboats are powered by powerful and efficient engines that allow them to glide through the water with ease. This propulsion system is chosen to ensure minimal impact on the environment while delivering the speed required to explore the vast Everglades. Safety Features Safety is our top priority. Our airboats are equipped with safety features such as reinforced hulls, secure seating, and safety rails. Our experienced airboat captains are trained to operate the vessels safely and responsibly. Comfortable Seating Comfort is essential for an enjoyable experience. Our airboats are fitted with comfortable seating to ensure that you can fully appreciate the beauty of the Everglades without any discomfort. Expert Navigation The Everglades can be complex to navigate due to its diverse terrain. Our airboat captains are experts in navigating these waterways, ensuring that you get to explore the most captivating and pristine areas while staying safe. Minimal Environmental Impact Our airboats are designed with the environment in mind. We strive to minimize our footprint in this delicate ecosystem while providing an opportunity for visitors to appreciate its beauty. Educational Experience Our airboat tours are not just about speed; they’re also about education. Our experienced guides offer insightful narration, sharing information about the Everglades’ history, wildlife, and significance, enriching your experience. Accessibility Our airboats are designed to accommodate a range of visitors, from families to individuals. We want everyone to have the chance to experience the magic of the Everglades. With our custom-built state-of-the-art airboats, we aim to provide an exceptional journey that combines adventure, education, and respect for the environment. We invite you to join us on one of our airboat tours to witness the wonders of the Florida Everglades and create memories that will last a lifetime. What To Expect From Our Airboat Captains: Safety First Safety is paramount, and our experienced captains are well-versed in navigating the Everglades’ diverse terrain. They are trained to handle a variety of situations and conditions, ensuring that your journey is both thrilling and secure. Passionate Storytellers Our captains aren’t just skilled navigators; they’re also passionate storytellers. They know how to share their knowledge in an engaging and relatable way, making the Everglades come alive with facts and anecdotes that capture your imagination. Connection to the Environment Our captains have a deep connection to the Everglades. Many of them have spent a significant part of their lives exploring and learning about this ecosystem. Their dedication to its preservation shines through in their enthusiasm for sharing its wonders with visitors. Environmental Advocates Our experienced captains are also advocates for the environment. They understand the importance of responsible tourism and conservation. By sharing their insights, they help foster a greater appreciation for the Everglades’ delicate balance and the need to protect it. Tailored Experiences Our captains can adapt their tours to the interests and preferences of the group. Whether you’re a wildlife enthusiast, a photography buff, or a family with young children, they can tailor the experience to ensure that everyone has a meaningful and enjoyable time. When you embark on an airboat tour with Everglades Holiday Park, you’re not just getting a ride; you’re getting an opportunity to learn, explore, and connect with the Everglades on a deeper level. Our experienced airboat captains are committed to providing an exceptional adventure that leaves you with cherished memories and a newfound appreciation for this unique ecosystem. And if you’re seeking a connection to the Atlantic Ocean, you’ll be delighted to know that we’re within walking distance of the mesmerizing Atlantic coastline. Tailored Experiences Whether you’re a school group, a corporate team, or a family gathering, our experienced guides are here to engage your group with interesting stories about the Everglades’ history, wildlife, and significance. Everyone in your whole team, from young explorers to seasoned adventurers, will have a great time as they learn and connect with this captivating environment. Catering for All We understand that a great day also involves great food. Choose from a variety of food and beverage packages to suit the size and appetite of your large party. Whether it’s a birthday celebration or a corporate event, our culinary offerings will satisfy the tastes of the whole family. Transportation Made Easy Worried about transportation? No problem! We’ve got you covered with vans and buses that can accommodate large groups of all sizes. Your group can enjoy a seamless journey to and from our park, ensuring that your focus remains on creating lasting memories.
